nodes.text: Annie Stoll is an award-winning designer, illustrator and art director. She has freelanced for Lucasfilm Ltd. as a graphic designer creating designs for Star Wars merchandise. She has created illustrations as Star Wars Rebels' graffiti artist Sabine Wren for the book Sabine My Rebel Sketchbook by author Dan Wallace.
Annie is a Grammy-nominated Art Director.

Annie was born in Buffalo, New York and studied design and illustration at Daemen College. She moved to New York City, where she is currently an Art Director with Sony Music Entertainment. She is the youngest woman to have been nominated for a Grammy for Best Recording Package. Her work has won many awards and been featured in magazine such as Communication Arts. Her art style is controlled chaos with anime and street influences.
